title: Booked for safekeeping
subject_group: Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Police discretion
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mental illness
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mental illness - Treatment
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mental illness - Public opinion
description: Demonstrates management of mentally ill people who become the responsibility of the police. Discusses treatment on reception, emphasising the need for immediate attention. Shows how to cope with violent or potentially violent patients and stresses the importance of treatment in the first few hours, and discusses the need for medical assistance in gaols.
